name: Synergy Direct Solution
tag_list: website-design, websites, search-engine-marketing, sem, ppc, adwords, search-marketing, seo, search-engine-optimization, email-newsletters, logo-design
overview:
Unbeknownst to most business owners having a professional online presence does not have to be expensive nor time consuming. Some businesses only need a simple landing page; some need a five page website, while others may need a more elaborate campaign. 75% of people will view your website to answer questions before calling the actual business. By leveraging your partnership with Synergy Direct Solution you’ll be putting yourself ahead of your competition while representing yourself online professionally.

Whether you’re looking for a simple yet professional online presence or an elaborate e-commerce website with a members section Synergy Direct Solution is the only choice. The process begins with a website evaluation and consultation and is followed with a free demonstration which will show you exactly what we can do for your business. You can be as hands on or as hands off as you’d like while we construct your web presence.

Search Engine Marketing is a form of internet marketing that seeks to promote websites by increasing their visibility in search engine results specifically within the sponsored listings. These types of listings are often referred to as pay per click (PPC) advertisements and currently account for 78% of Googles revenue. These programs include Google Adwords, Yahoo Search Marketing, and Microsoft Ad Center. Through the use of these programs business owners can generate traffic to their website and gain more local customers.

Synergy Direct Solution will evaluate your website, diagnose your keywords, and create compelling ads in order to capture the interest of your perspective customer. This campaign is highly flexible with your budget, your keywords, and your geographic location. You can target only local customers who are looking for your products or services. Search engine marketing is one of many ways to drive traffic to your website. Synergy can help with social media, newsletters, and much, much more!

milestones.description: Synergy moves into larger office space and begins recruiting!
Synergy introduces the Smart Marketing Package
Synergy joins the Google Engage for Agencies Program
